input.sentences: family went out to see the scottish parade in town .
it was really interesting seeing all the different colored kilts .
the mascot was a crowd favorite !
they decided to gather in a nearby field for some photos and other traditions .
the coordinated dancing was fun to watch !
output.sentences: You can feel the excitement from the crowd.
Wearing the traditional kilt during pre-game is a lot less awkward then I thought it would be.
The mascots are leading the crowd to the stadium.
We have the best team in the league and everyone knows it.
The ban is warming up and the crowd is ready!
